trans-unit.source: Supports a simple iteration over an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Supporta un'iterazione semplice su un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators provide read-only access to the data in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Gli enumeratori forniscono l'accesso in sola lettura ai dati in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile utilizzare enumeratori per modificare la raccolta sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente l'enumeratore è posizionato prima del primo elemento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> resets the enumerator to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>Reimposta l'enumeratore in questa posizione.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: In questa posizione, la chiamata <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, è necessario chiamare <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>per passare l'enumeratore al primo elemento della raccolta prima di leggere il valore di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe eredita da <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: See the class for more information about enumerating over a collection.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la classe per ulteriori informazioni sull'enumerazione in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento corrente il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Current does not move the position of the enumerator and consecutive calls to Current return the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Corrente non si sposta la posizione dell'enumeratore e le chiamate successive a corrente restituiscono lo stesso oggetto finché non <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento corrente nella <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore è posizionato davanti al primo elemento della raccolta o dopo l'ultimo elemento.

trans-unit.source: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sposta l'enumeratore all'elemento successivo di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the enumerator to the next element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo sposta l'enumeratore all'elemento successivo della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator> class inherits from <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>; see this class for more information on using enumerators.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator>classe eredita da <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>; vedere la classe per ulteriori informazioni sull'utilizzo degli enumeratori.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'enumeratore è avanzato all'elemento successivo; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se l'enumeratore ha superato la fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta è stata modificata dopo la creazione dell'enumeratore.

trans-unit.source: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'enumeratore sulla propria posizione iniziale, ovvero prima del primo elemento di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Un enumeratore rimane valido fino a quando la raccolta rimane invariata.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or Reset throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono apportate modifiche alla raccolta, ad esempio aggiungendo, modificando o eliminando elementi, l'enumeratore viene invalidato e la successiva chiamata al <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>o reimpostazione genererà un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta è stata modificata dopo la creazione dell'enumeratore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento corrente il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>non modifica la posizione dell'enumeratore e le chiamate successive a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>restituiscono lo stesso oggetto finché non <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento corrente nella <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore è posizionato davanti al primo elemento della raccolta o dopo l'ultimo elemento.
